title: The Days of Being an Assistant for the CEO of a Mary Sue Novel - Novel Updates
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Short Story   Time Skip   Transmigration
author: 池中砚
description:
Me, your average personal assistant.

What’s not average about me is that I’m the personal assistant of the domineering CEO in those Mary Sue novels (“The day has gotten colder, Wang Corporation will go bankrupt”).

As well as——the quite unusual tasks that the CEO requests of me.

I feel like it’s a bit difficult for me. >
